info.title: (DO NOT DELETE) NEAR Rewards API v2

200.description: A rewards result set with metadata.

accounts.description: delegator address that received the rewards.

chain_id.description: Id of the chain that recorded the rewards. Always mainnet.

validator.description: The validator that distributed the rewards

period.description: The epoch number (only present when no aggregation is requested).

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the end of the epoch or date in the daily aggregation.

items.description: The formula to compute the final rewards in the currency unit is numeric x 10^(-exp).

text.description: The textual version of the other fields in the rewards object.

exp.description: The exponent used to calculate the textual NEAR amount.

items.description: The account's staked balance to the validator for the period.

text.description: The textual version of the other fields in the balances object.

exp.description: The exponent used to calculate the textual NEAR amount.

network.description: The name of the network queried.

start.description: Epoch numbers (as integers) or timestamps (as strings "YYYY-MM-DD")

end.description: Epoch numbers (as integers) or timestamps (as strings "YYYY-MM-DD")

aggregation.description: Allows you to get rewards by epoch (default if nothing is passed) or by day (if daily is passed).
